sys_script.name: Update vehicle status

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_797134b797003110791bff36f053af9a
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_848642_loaner_0_vehicle_tracker</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Update vehicle status</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

// create two variables for vehicle and vehicle status
	var vehicle = new GlideRecord('vehicle');
	var vehicleStatus = current.getValue('vehicle_status');
// add conditions  
		if (vehicleStatus == 'pending release'|| vehicleStatus =='out on field'|| vehicleStatus == 'returned for inspection'|| vehicleStatus =='sent for servicing') {
//Query the value of the current vehicle 
			vehicle.addQuery('sys_id', current.getValue());
// set the new value 
			vehicle.setValue('status','Unavailable');
//update the form. If the condition is met the form will be updated to a new status. 
			vehicle.update();
}
//similar code with new condtions and set update if the condition is met.  
	else if(vehicleStatus == 'Returned to Warehouse'){
		vehicle.addQuery('sys_id', current.getValue());
		vehicle.setValue('status', 'Available');
		vehicle.update();
	}
////similar code with new condtions and set update If the condition is met.  
		else if(vehicleStatus == Decommissioned){
			vehicle.addQuery('sys_id', current.getValue());
			vehicle.setValue('status', 'Decommissioned');
			vehicle.update();
		}
		

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-22 03:30:59</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>797134b797003110791bff36f053af9a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>30</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Update vehicle status</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory" source="x_848642_loaner_0">84aafe80976b2110791bff36f053af21</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Loaner Vehicle Request and Inventory">84aafe80976b2110791bff36f053af21</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_797134b797003110791bff36f053af9a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-31 13:54:46</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=797134b797003110791bff36f053af9a"/></record_update>
